abstract:
\begin{abstract}
We consider the model with the dilaton and twisted moduli fields, 
which is inspired by type I string models.
Stabilization of their vacuum expectation values is studied.
We find the stabilization of the twisted moduli field 
has different aspects from the dilaton stabilization.
\
